comments:
Hi,
 I have reports designed with birt 2.1 final release, and when i want to
 run them with lastest N-xxx builds all my scripts (On report initialize event)
 throws javascript exceptions.
 There area something new on N-xxxx builds?

 I had downloaded las designer and save them with it but still have same
 problems.

 I will atach a report example with all my scripts.
 
 Thanks in advance,
 Mauro

The parametr's structure has been changed since BIRT 2.1

In curren version BIRT, you should specify the value or displayText to the parameter in the script.

For example:
In your attached script, the code 
params["COLUMN"] != ""
should be changed as
params["COLUMN"].value != ""

Yes, thats works, but i have another problem with texts elements (this works on 2.1 release): Code: df = new Packages.java.text.DecimalFormat("$###,##0.00"); df.format(Total.sum(row["NETAMOUNT"],Total.NO_FILTER, Total.OVERALL)); Error: Text (id = 1279): - There are errors evaluating script " df = new Packages.java.text.DecimalFormat("###,##0"); df.format(row["TOTAL_COLUMN_7"]); ". I have make a sample to using DecimalFormat in BIRT script.
The code is:
df = new Packages.java.text.DecimalFormat("$###,##0.00");
df.format(row["EMPLOYEENUMBER"]);


I will attach the sample design file. Please rewrite your script according the sample. If it still has some problem, please send me your design file.

By the way, if you have some other different problems , please submit a new bug. Because they may caused by different resion. This bug has been set as wontfix. Other problem maybe must be fixed.

Thanks.

traces.message: There are errors evaluating script " df = new Packages.java.text.DecimalFormat("###,##0"); df.format(row["TOTAL_COLUMN_7"]); ".

causedBy.message: Cannot format given Object as a Number (<inline>#3)
